results.title: All This Mayhem
results.brief_description: A searing account of what happens when raw talent and extreme personalities collide. In this unflinching, never-before-seen account of drugs and the dark side of professional skateboarding, brothers Tas and Ben Pappas’ intense bond and charisma take them from the pinnacle of their sport into a spiraling world of self-destruction.

constellations_primary.name: Skate or die
constellations_primary.description: Skateboarding is a subculture frequently documented, from amateur skate videos filmed with fish-eye lenses, to documentaries exploring the genesis of the subculture and gritty feature films depicting underlying social dynamics.

results.description: A searing account of what happens when raw talent and extreme personalities collide. results.title: All this began at two bob a night at Collingwood
results.creator_credit: Lloyd Capps and Australian Broadcasting Commission
results.brief_description: Retraces the life and work of Tom Roberts, and looks at over 90 of Roberts’ paintings and the people and places surrounding them.

results.title: All the World's a Stage
results.brief_description: Follows the progress of three students from their auditions before John Houseman for the Drama Division at the famous Juilliard School for performing arts, through to rigorous training to become professional actors.

results.title: All the way up there
results.creator_credit: Gaylene Preston, Warrick Attewell and Valhalla Film Productions
results.brief_description: Bruce Burgess, a 24 year-old cerebral palsy victim, realises an impossible dream - to climb a mountain. He manages to achieve this with the help of Graeme Dingle, one of New Zealand’s best known mountaineers. Emphasises the need for individual self-fulfilment despite physical or other limitations Narrated by David Yerix.

results.title: All the steaks
results.creator_credit: Meat and Livestock Australia and Kingcroft Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Meat makes the meal”.
Barbara Lynch, home economist for the Australian Meat Board discusses meat and shows the different cuts of steaks and how to butcher them. No other credits available.

results.title: All The Same
results.brief_description: Asylum seeker Mostafa Azimitabar, know as ‘Moz’ shot and released the music video for his song ‘All The Same’ from inside the Manus Island detention centre via a mobile phone.

constellations_other.name: Seeking asylum
constellations_other.description: Chauka Please Tell Us the Time was covertly filmed on a smartphone inside the Manus Island Detention Centre and sent via WhatsApp.

results.title: All the Rivers Run II
results.brief_description: This is a stunning sequel to the internationally acclaimed series of the same name. The once thriving riverboat trade has been hit hard by bad times with the shearers strike and the arrival of new roads and railways. Brenton, Delie and their three children are desperately battling the odds to simply earn a living on the river. Into their lives walks a mysterious stranger who is immediately drawn to Delie. Based on the novel by Nancy Cato. R Rated: PG

results.title: All the rivers run [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Ian Crawford, Hector Crawford and Crawford Productions
results.brief_description: A story of love between a man, a woman and the river which bound them together. After being shipwrecked a young woman accepts her uncle’s offer of the chance to begin a new life at Echuca where she meets her future husband. Together, they start a business carrying cargo on the Murray River. An adventurous story set in the early days of white settlement on the Murray River. Based on the novel by Nancy Cato.

results.title: All the right stuff
results.creator_credit: Connie Littlefield, Mike Mahoney and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Join Brendan as he spends $200 of his disposable birthday cash on clothes, music and entertainment. He is just one of a large group that is an image marketers dream; young, impressionable, earning money from a low paying service job with money to burn. Whilst working his way in and out of well known brand name shops, he, as well as other teenagers, shop owners and adults, discuss the impact of advertising on them, how it influences their sense of being and consumer purchasing. They also share their thoughts for their future.
